import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function NavBar(props) { const mystyle= { backgroundColor: props.mode==="dark"?"aliceblue":"black", color:props.mode==="dark"?"black":"white", link:"dark"?"white":"black" } return (
